name: ValidityState
description: The ValidityState interface represents the validity states that an element can be in, with respect to constraint validation. Together, they help explain why an element's value fails to validate, if it's not valid.

members.name: ValidityState.badInput
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the user has provided input that the browser is unable to convert.

members.name: ValidityState.customError
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the element's custom validity message has been set to a non-empty string by calling the element's setCustomValidity() method.

members.name: ValidityState.patternMismatch
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the value does not match the specified pattern.

members.name: ValidityState.rangeOverflow
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the value is greater than the maximum specified by the max attribute.

members.name: ValidityState.rangeUnderflow
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the value is less than the minimum specified by the min attribute.

members.name: ValidityState.stepMismatch
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the value does not fit the rules determined by the step attribute (that is, it's not evenly divisible by the step value).

members.name: ValidityState.tooLong
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the value exceeds the specified maxlength for HTMLInputElement or HTMLTextAreaElement objects. Note: This will never be true in Gecko, because elements' values are prevented from being longer than maxlength.

members.name: ValidityState.tooShort
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the value fails to meetÂ the specified minlength for HTMLInputElement or HTMLTextAreaElement objects.

members.name: ValidityState.typeMismatch
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the value is not in the required syntax (when type is email or url).

members.name: ValidityState.valid
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the element meets all constraint validations, and is therefore considered to be valid.

members.name: ValidityState.valueMissing
members.description: Is a Boolean indicating the element has a required attribute, but no value.
